name: max-revive
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Revives the Pokémon and restores its HP to full.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also fully restores a fainted Pokémon’s maximum HP.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also fully restores a fainted Pokémon’s maximum HP.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A medicine that can be used to revive a single Pokémon that has fainted. It also fully restores the Pokémon’s max HP.
